detaileddescription.para: Set need tool tip mode flag. Enable this if you need tool tip events for widget
Get need tool tip mode flag
Set mouse pointer for this widget
Get mouse pointer name for this widget
Set need key focus flag
Is need key focus If disable this widget won't be reacting on keyboard at all. Enabled (true) by default.
Set need mouse focus flag
Is need mouse focus If disable this widget won't be reacting on mouse at all. Enabled (true) by default.
Set inherits mode flag This mode makes all child widgets pickable even if widget don't need mouse focus (was set setNeedKeyFocus(false) ). Disabled (false) by default.
Get inherits mode flag
Set picking mask for widget
Set picking mask for widget

Event : Widget lost mouse focus. signature : void method(MyGUI::Widget* _sender, MyGUI::Widget* _new)
